channel.title: geeknight on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in geeknight on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: Geeknight - XR - eXtending the Reality
item.description: Geek Night is a regular event to promote the sharing of technical knowledge and increase collaboration among the geeks. It is organized by a passionate group of programmers and sponsored by ThoughtWorks. The upcoming geek night would cover Extended Reality - An umbrella term covering various technologies like AR,VR and MR. I will be discussing what is XR, its usage and significance today, that is stretching beyond gaming. Embracing an Agile approach is essential to any successful XR implementation.
